name: Shanxi Jiexiu Zhengyi Coal Mine
company_mentions: Shanxi Coking Coal Group Jiexiu Zhengyi Coal Industry Co Ltd

verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.gem.wiki/%E5%B1%B1%E8%A5%BF%E7%84%A6%E7%85%A4%E9%9B%86%E5%9B%A2%E4%BB%8B%E4%BC%91%E6%AD%A3%E7%9B%8A%E7%85%A4%E4%B8%9A%E6%9C%89%E9%99%90%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8. The Shanxi Jiexiu Zhengyi Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in the village of Gancao Ling, Lianfu Town, Jiexiu City, Jinzhong Prefecture

operators: Shanxi Coking Coal Group Jiexiu Zhengyi Coal Industry Co Ltd
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Shanxi Coking Coal Group Jiexiu Zhengyi Coal Industry Co Ltd, which is a subsidiary of the state-owned Shanxi Coking Coal Group.
